programme.title: NFL Playoffs
programme.desc: Minnesota (14-3) ranked fifth in the NFL in both sacks and takeaways this season; Los Angeles Rams (10-7) have won the three previous meetings vs. the Vikings, including a 30-20 victory in Week 8, as Matthew Stafford threw for 279 yards and four TDs.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Miami claimed victories over Los Angeles in both of their meetings in the 2023-2024 season, winning the most recent matchup on Jan. 3, 110-96, led by Tyler Herro's 21 points; Anthony Davis posted 29 points and 17 rebounds for the Lakers in the loss.

programme.title: Pro Volleyball Federation
programme.desc: Omaha claimed a 3-0 victory over Grand Rapids in the 2024 PVF Final on May 18, led by 13 kills and 8 digs from both Stephanie Samedy and Bethania De La Cruz; Claire Chaussee and Emiliya Dimitrova both had 12 kills for the Rise's defeat.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: UCLA (11-5, 2-3) dropped its last three games after a 79-61 loss to Maryland; Rutgers (8-8, 1-4) lost three straight, but is 7-2 at home behind Dylan Harper, who leads Big Ten scoring with 20.1 ppg, and Ace Bailey, who is fourth with 18.9 ppg.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: No. 5 Indiana (10-0, 7-0) is second in the nation in scoring, averaging 43.9 ppg, behind Kurtis Rourke, who has thrown for 21 TDs; No. 2 Ohio State (9-1, 6-1) is first in the nation in scoring defense, allowing 10.3 ppg, and won the last 31 meetings.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: UCLA (11-5, 2-3) dropped its last three games after a 79-61 loss to Maryland; Rutgers (8-8, 1-4) lost three straight, but is 7-2 at home behind Dylan Harper, who leads Big Ten scoring with 20.1 ppg, and Ace Bailey, who is fourth with 18.9 ppg.

programme.title: TMZ Sports

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: No. 24 Illinois (3-0) stayed unbeaten with a 30-9 win over Central Michigan behind twp TDs from Pat Bryant; No. 22 Nebraska (3-0) is outscoring its opponents, 102-20, and beat Illinois last year, 20-7, after losing the previous three meetings.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Purdue (1-4, 0-2) dropped four straight since beating Indiana State, 49-0, but won its last four meetings with the Fighting Illini after a 44-19 win last season; No. 23 Illinois (4-1, 1-1) had its undefeated start ended by Penn State, 21-7.

programme.title: Magnify
programme.desc: The cultural importance of sports is examined through the exploration of various athletes' journeys through life, both on and off the field, including the challenges, change and unity that sports are able to bring to different communities.

programme.title: Magnify
programme.desc: The disappearance of quarterback Tom Brady's jersey after leading the New England Patriots' epic comeback to beat the Atlanta Falcons in Super Bowl LI is chronicled, which includes exclusive conversations with Brady and the man who stole the jersey.
